>>> import subprocess
>>>
>>> try:
...     output = subprocess.run(["gcloud.cmd", "--version"], check=True, capture_output=True, text=True)
...     print("✅ gcloud is working inside Python without shell=True!", output.stdout)
... except FileNotFoundError:
...     print("❌ gcloud is still NOT found in Python.")
...
✅ gcloud is working inside Python without shell=True! Google Cloud SDK 513.0.0
